data.name: Text0_1
data.value: These days creativity, ideation, and idea management begin to gain more and more value. Each day we must face many new challenges- it may be at the university, at school, at work, or even at home. In all these places, we meet with various problems or needs, that we must solve as fast as our legs could carry us. We are working multitasking and it’s always expected of us to be creative, innovative, and highly productive. We must cooperate with a big amount of people despite we are all so busy and scattered around the world. It all requires an adjustment and use of the latest opportunities offered to us by technological development.

data.name: Text0_2
data.value: And then…The IT tools come to our aid.

data.name: Text1
data.value: Unlimited options for working on the process

data.name: Text1_1
data.value:
Due to IT tools, we’ve got an incredible possibility to work on cases in any part of the world, only with help of a computer. We’re creating international teams so that we meet new people and
learn about their cultures. That gives us the possibility of exchanging experiences and knowledge, even between experts in the remotest corners of the world. Not only the location ceases to be an obstacle, but also time. We can work flexible hours. Working in Cloud enables us to develop our ideas any time we’ve got one. It helps a lot because we’ve got unlimited options. And this, combined with online knowledge resources, gives us amazing opportunities.

data.name: Text2
data.value: Expand the range of thinking through visualization

data.name: Text2_1
data.value: IT tools help us with creating and developing ideas as well. With their help, we can visualize at high levels of advancement and develop ideas by combining many tools at the same time. We’ve got so many options and each of them is different, special. We can use ready templates, graphics, videos, notes, sets of research notes, and many other graphic tools. We reach e.g. Miro or Canva and by working with them, we start to expand the range of ideas beyond the current range of thinking. This type of work gives us a new perspective on many known things. The use of IT tools allows us to bring our visions to the documents and see them in a more substantial form. The process of creating visualizations and working on their every detail makes us reflect deeper. We begin to question the correctness of many aspects, their reality, and their applicability. Then we start to look for new solutions, that will be maybe more suitable.

data.name: Text3_1
data.value: As I said we all have amazing opportunities to make of, but it depends on us if we will take advantage of them. I’m happy that I decided to ride this new experience out. A short time ago, I had got amazing opportunity to take part in a very interesting project. Our task was to find the best, most innovative, and creative solution to the presented problem. The main thing was that during this whole process we were encouraged to use many various IT tools, which we didn’t know so far. I had a lot of doubts because at that moment I wasn’t into this ground. I hadn’t got sufficient knowledge and I knew that I would have to learn everything from scratch. That scared me a little, but I didn't want to give up and this is how my journey with founding and exploring the way of using IT tools in the analysis of innovative projects began.

data.name: Text3_2
data.value: I did not regret my decision. I’ve worked with my team on our project with a big investment. It involved us a lot. I started to feel a thirst for knowledge and look for ideas in my free time on my account. The discussion about the discoveries of each of us was thrilling. I don’t know how to describe our brainstorms. I was really impressed that we can influence ourselves and generate so many various examples of solutions.

data.name: Text3_3
data.value:
It wasn’t always easy. First, we must learn how to use tools, which was at our command. You know when we deal with something new it isn’t always all downhill. We made a lot of mistakes, spoiled our project, and must rebuild it, but I think that this way of work teaches us the most. Every mistake helps us to understand better the use of the particular tool. The inbuilt guides turned out to
be extremely helpful. We read the tips and learned new things in an extremely accessible way. They were adapted to even the most novice users. We developed our skills and knowledge using the method of small steps.

data.name: Text3_4
data.value: Even though the use of IT tools requires us to have access to the Internet and computer equipment or mobile, which may be a limit or a problem in some situations, I think it’s well worth the effort. In our team, we were from many different towns, to which everyone returned during part of the week, and in that, we were not attached to the place. We used online calls, Miro, and Canvas tools, so we were working in Cloud. That helps a lot. Any time we had an idea we were able to discuss it with other members, and maybe inspire them. Sometimes our hardware and software were stuck, and we must show our patience. Perhaps this would not be the case if we had used traditional methods, but I suspect that in such a case we would spend much more time on corrections, preparation for work, and collecting the necessary tools. IT tools offer us everything in one place.

data.name: Text3_5
data.value: I must also mention of one another weak point. The most important disadvantage was to keep the team focused on the work. It takes a lot of effort to organize work well, during which everyone is involved to a similar degree and performs the tasks entrusted to him. No face-to-face contact handicapped management of it, but it may also occur in other cases. The use of IT tools can also take place in direct contact. It is not closely related to this method of work. However, the work using IT tools lets us in such situations to work also in adapted to us time and structure a plan of work with due dates, tasks lists, and guidelines.

data.name: Text3_6
data.value: So, what would you say if I told you that not using IT tools will limit us and closes our perspectives?

data.name: Text3_7
data.value: What do you think about it?

data.name: Text3_8
data.value: Please let me know, I can not wait to start a conversation about that.

data.name: Title
data.value: The support of IT tools for the needs of creativity, ideation, and idea management
